data:item.name: an-mipi-dsi-screen-pushing-rt500
data:item.overview:
i.MXRT595 is a dual-core microcontroller combined a graphics engine and a streamlined Cadence速 Tensilica速 Fusion F1 DSP core with Arm速 Cortex速- M33 core. It offers an embedded solution for smart watch or other display device due to the role of GPU.Power consumption and frame rate are the considerations for performance evaluation during pushing screen. These two points are affected by many factors, such as the number and location of frame buffer and complexity of graphics. This document illustrates graphics drawing methods and performance comparisons under different conditions.
Please refer to AN13509 for complete instructions on how to use this software.
